entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who smashed into a bookcase and was deluged in a cascade of heavy books. She also used the spell 'Silencio' to extinguish the Death Eater's voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who was hit by a bookcase and had tiny lights burst in front of his eyes. He also used the spell 'Petrificus Totalus' to immobilize the second Death Eater.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards who are trying to capture Harry. They are using spells and wands to try and defeat him.

relationships.description: Hermione used the spell 'Silencio' to immobilize one of the Death Eaters, making him unable to speak.
Harry used the spell 'Petrificus Totalus' to immobilize one of the Death Eaters, making him unable to move.
One of the Death Eaters made a slashing movement with his wand and cast a purple flame spell that passed across Hermione's chest.
